channel.title: Allow changing autofill / in-query suggestions to lowercase via an option
channel.description:
We try to enforce lowercase-only queries in all our conventions across databases, but writing queries in half-uppercase and half-lowercase due to uppercase suggestions breaks eyesights and causes productivity loss.
Having an option in Settings to choose lower/uppercase would be the best.
